title: >>> Wild WALKERS and WHEELCHAIRS
body_text:
Welcome to Week 2 of consecutive birthday celebrations!
Last week, DODGEBALL 78 paid tribute to the charismatic loud-mouth Justin Pierce with a deserving surprise 23rd birthday bash. What an eventful evening it was and despite the sudden on-court injury, DODGEBALL 78 was nothing short of a success thanks to both Diana DiBuccio and Lauren Stopa.
One week later, the party continues with the 25th birthday gathering for one Chris Adams. Like Pierce, Chris has earned the respect and admiration of his peers becoming one of the greatest superstars to ever set foot on the dodgeball courts.
DODGEBALL 79, subtitled "When the YOUNG grow OLD", plays hosts to this anticipated extravaganza. The celebration of the life and times of one of dodgeball's true legends will kick off at an early
3pm
. Expect a very similar set-up with party streamers, tasty food, and great music.
CHRIS'S CHOICE
The man himself, Chris Adams, rules DODGEBALL 79 as he sees fit. Captains, stipulations, and gametypes will be selected by the eldest Adams. Will he put himself in his 9th captains confrontation? Will
Prison Ball
be a factor?
Do not forget, the sun will be out all afternoon so Chris has the option of even choosing which courts he'd prefer! Will the sport return to the back courts for the first time since November 2006?
Get ready for first afternoon event in 9 months!
A Message from Pond Scum member Dan Turner
Event: Football / Dodgeball game
Date: March 9, 2007
Time: 4pm to 8pm
Location: Veteran's Field in Bayville
"It's a football and Dodgeball game that's gonna be played at Veteran's field in Bayville, NJ. However, no one has to participate in both. Anybody who wants to can. For the Dodgeball section, all the people from East Coast Dodgeball are welcome to come and have a good time."
Directions:
- Take Garden State Parkway South to Exit 77
- Keep left after the toll. Turn Left at the light.
- Park is on your right after you pass Central Regional High School.
Join in on some Friday Fun with the legends of Pond Scum! All invited!
body_html:
Welcome to Week 2 of consecutive birthday celebrations!

Last week, DODGEBALL 78 paid tribute to the charismatic loud-mouth Justin Pierce with a deserving surprise 23rd birthday bash. What an eventful evening it was and despite the sudden on-court injury, DODGEBALL 78 was nothing short of a success thanks to both Diana DiBuccio and Lauren Stopa.

One week later, the party continues with the 25th birthday gathering for one Chris Adams. Like Pierce, Chris has earned the respect and admiration of his peers becoming one of the greatest superstars to ever set foot on the dodgeball courts.

DODGEBALL 79, subtitled "When the YOUNG grow OLD", plays hosts to this anticipated extravaganza. The celebration of the life and times of one of dodgeball's true legends will kick off at an early 3pm. Expect a very similar set-up with party streamers, tasty food, and great music.

CHRIS'S CHOICE
The man himself, Chris Adams, rules DODGEBALL 79 as he sees fit. Captains, stipulations, and gametypes will be selected by the eldest Adams. Will he put himself in his 9th captains confrontation? Will Prison Ball be a factor?

Do not forget, the sun will be out all afternoon so Chris has the option of even choosing which courts he'd prefer! Will the sport return to the back courts for the first time since November 2006?

Get ready for first afternoon event in 9 months!


A Message from Pond Scum member Dan Turner
Event: Football / Dodgeball game
Date: March 9, 2007
Time: 4pm to 8pm
Location: Veteran's Field in Bayville

"It's a football and Dodgeball game that's gonna be played at Veteran's field in Bayville, NJ. However, no one has to participate in both. Anybody who wants to can. For the Dodgeball section, all the people from East Coast Dodgeball are welcome to come and have a good time."

Directions:
- Take Garden State Parkway South to Exit 77
- Keep left after the toll. Turn Left at the light.
- Park is on your right after you pass Central Regional High School.

Join in on some Friday Fun with the legends of Pond Scum! All invited!
